document.full_text: the u.s. economy is on track for a sustained recovery but remains sufficiently weak to warrant the help of loose monetary policy, atlanta federal reserve president dennis lockhart said on monday.
document.title: fed's lockhart doesn't think price surge will last
lines_and_colors: the u.s. economy is on track for a sustained recovery but remains sufficiently weak to warrant the help of loose monetary policy, atlanta federal reserve president dennis lockhart said on monday.
